text: 4.7 Ais 26.3, Jon 14.27, Lom 5.1, Kol 3.15 Agnɨgenɨmɨb God nɨbop gek, kɨmɨgel mɨdtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabɨm. Kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨl Klays Jisas nop chɨg tep gɨl yenɨgabɨm anɨb ak tek, chɨbol sayn ak sek, gos tɨmud nɨbi ak sek, mɨdtep gɨnɨgab. God ne gek kɨmɨgel mɨdtep gɨpun anɨb ak, tap teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb, gos chɨn ak bɨlokep tek ma mɨdeb.
